## FlyoutButton.moveBy() method

Move the element by a relative offset.

**Signature:**

```typescript
moveBy(dx: number, dy: number, _reason?: string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dx | number | Horizontal offset in workspace units. |
|  dy | number | Vertical offset in workspace units. |
|  \_reason | string\[\] | _(Optional)_ Why is this move happening? 'user', 'bump', 'snap'... |

**Returns:**

void
